long_description: The Mammut Neon Crag 28 Pack is a rugged and versatile gear hauler for your done-in-a-day rock climbs and hikes, or simply for everyday use. Padded, anatomically shaped shoulder straps and removable hipbelt along with a 3D EVA air-channel foam mesh back panel offer breathable comfort. Innovative compression-fold closure keeps the pack stable and low-profile when empty or stuffed full; top lid contains 2 pockets-1 internal and 1 external. V-cut profile and large top-opening make packing and sorting gear very easy; 10.5 in. wide inner kangaroo pocket accommodates a laptop, flip-flops or other flat items. Internal gear loops for organization. Large vertical front zip pocket for maps or a guidebook. The Mammut Neon Crag 28 Pack is made with robust natural canvas material treated with a durable water repellant to ensure moisture resistance in inclement weather.
short_description: The Mammut Neon Crag 28 Pack is a rugged and versatile gear hauler for your done-in-a-day rock climbs and hikes, or simply for everyday use.
